UsageÂ¶

from DataSounds.sounds import get_music, w2Midi
import numpy as np

data = np.random.rand(24)
music = get_music(data)
w2Midi('my_musica_data', music)

w2Midi writes a .midi file inside the current directory. In this case, will be generated my_music_data.midi. Enjoy it!
